name: csv-data-import-example
description: This example teaches how to import any data into caisy. We will use a csv as input format, but the leared appraoch can be applied to any data format that you can convert to json.  For the same of this example we try to import blog posts from wordpress into caisy. Although to follow allow there is no understanding of wordpress needed. We just assume you know how to work with typescript, thats all.
